item.title: A reflection of my accomplishments in 2018
item.description: I wanted to blog a bit about what some of my accomplishments and learnings were in 2018. So here we go! Took a break from speaking at conferences Iâ€™d decided to take a break from speaking at multiple conferences in 2018. I wanted to focus more on growing my professional skills, mentoring and starting my meetup. All of which were things that I was able to accomplish. I did miss speaking but it was for the better that I took that time off.

item.title: Some traits I look for in a potential apprentice
item.description: Before we dig into this topic. I want to make it clear that these are my personal views on what I look for when hiring an apprentice or reaching out to a potential candidate. These views may not reflect those of every employee at the company (8th Light). As an aside, I use the term “Software Crafter” often as it is the term my company uses to refer to its developers.
